response.guest_response:
Dear Sid,

I am writing to offer my sincerest apologies for the inconvenience you experienced with your TV remote not working in our room, Room 343. I understand how frustrating this must have been and I want to assure you that we take such issues seriously.

We are taking immediate action to resolve this issue. Our IT department is currently investigating the matter and will be replacing the faulty remote control as soon as possible. In the meantime, we will provide you with an alternative remote control from our spare stock.

I would like to inform you that we have scheduled a maintenance window for tonight between 8 PM and 10 PM to ensure that all rooms are checked and any issues are addressed. Our team will be working diligently to resolve this issue within the allotted timeframe of one hour.

Please accept my apologies again for the inconvenience caused. If you have any further concerns or questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. We value your feedback and appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this matter.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Front Desk and IT Departments

response.guest_response:
Dear Sid,

I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for the experience you had in our establishment. We are thrilled to hear that your stay was "really nice" and we appreciate the time you took to share your feedback with us.

At [Hotel Name], we strive to provide exceptional service and accommodations to all our guests. Although we fell short of meeting your expectations, we take this as an opportunity to learn and improve for future guests.

I want to assure you that we are taking immediate action to address the matter. Our Front Desk Team will review our protocols to ensure that every guest receives a warm welcome and personalized attention. Additionally, we will conduct a thorough review of our operations to prevent similar situations from arising in the future.

We appreciate your feedback and value your business. We are committed to providing an exceptional experience for all our guests, and we hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you better.

Thank you for your understanding, and please do not hesitate to contact me directly if you have any further concerns or questions.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Operations Manager
